instructions.title: How to use JSON a CSV

steps.title: Paste your JSON data
steps.description: Copy and paste your JSON data into the input area. The tool accepts any format and will process it immediately.

steps.title: Configure options (if available)
steps.description: Adjust formatting options, indentation, or other settings to match your preferences and coding standards.

steps.title: Review the output
steps.description: The tool will process your input and display the result with proper formatting and validation.

steps.title: Copy or download result
steps.description: Copy the formatted JSON to your clipboard for immediate use or download it as a file for storage and sharing.

tagline: Convert JSON to CSV with advanced formatting and column mapping
pageDescription: Free JSON to CSV converter with advanced flattening, column mapping, and formatting options. Transform JSON arrays, nested objects, and complex data structures into Excel-compatible CSV files. Features drag-and-drop column ordering, custom delimiters, header configuration, and real-time preview. Perfect for data export, API response conversion, and spreadsheet integration. Secure browser-based processing with no file uploads.
